channel.title: Request for codes
channel.description:
in my old server, i had some codes that i dont have now, and im too lazy to make. I had a master code, where when activated, you would get max stats. mod lv 3+ only please.
also a godmode, where you start floating, and get unlimited run. mod lv 3+ please again

item.title: Request for codes
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

You didn’t type correctly.

[quote=“igottapet, post:1, topic:165841”]in my old server, i had some codes that i dont have now, and seeing how I can’t program, I want you to get me the code. I had a master code, where when activated, you would get max stats. mod lv 3+ only please.

also a godmode, where you start floating, and get unlimited run. mod lv 3+ please again[/quote]

Fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Request for codes
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

“and im too lazy to make”

and im too lazy to post this kthxbai
JK

Master code if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxstats") && (playerRights >= 3)) { addSkillXP(140000000, 0); addSkillXP(140000000, 1); addSkillXP(140000000, 2); addSkillXP(140000000, 3); addSkillXP(140000000, 4); addSkillXP(140000000, 5); addSkillXP(140000000, 6); addSkillXP(140000000, 7); addSkillXP(140000000, 8); addSkillXP(140000000, 9); addSkillXP(140000000, 10); addSkillXP(140000000, 11); addSkillXP(140000000, 12); addSkillXP(140000000, 13); addSkillXP(140000000, 14); addSkillXP(140000000, 16); addSkillXP(140000000, 17); addSkillXP(140000000, 18); addSkillXP(140000000, 19); addSkillXP(140000000, 20); addSkillXP(140000000, 21); addSkillXP(140000000, 22); addSkillXP(140000000, 23); addSkillXP(140000000, 24); sendMessage("Masterful"); }

God code. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 3) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("::godoff to turn off."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 3){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Glad to help.

Read full topic
